Author: thotmija
Text: Thank you sooo much it rly means a lot  :((  and as far as talking to her about my triggers, i doubt it, she needs to be educated on eating disorders first, shes literally told me "youre binging" with some snark look on her face when i asked for dessert ice cream once after dinner lmao and countless other things, there's really no hope for now, i try to ignore her but the whole "just stop eating youll hate yourself for it" sent me over the edge...but anyways thank you so much for reminding me that im the one whos really aware here, i needed that sooo much ugh <3

Author: FridgethatRidge
Text: Man I'm sorry you had to go through that. Is there any way you could be able to talk to her about how she triggers you? (You don't have to use that word) if not just try to remember that you know what you're putting into your body, and she doesn't have any right to tell you what you should and shouldn't be eating. Hope you feel better soon. Sending hugs.
